optionDiedBefore: This executor died (before the person who has died)
optionDiedAfter: This executor died (after the person who has died)
optionPowerReserved: This executor doesn’t want to apply now, but may do in the future (this is also known as power reserved)
optionRenunciated: This executor doesn’t want to apply now, and gives up the right to do so in the future (this is also known as renunciation, and the executor will need to fill in a form)
